topics.title: Trade House Introduction and AMM vs Order Book
topics.summary: Introduction of Trade House as a trustless order book DEX with partial filling capabilities. Comparison between AMM trading issues (high slippage, fixed prices, market fluctuations) versus order book trading advantages.

topics.title: Trade House Core Features and Technical Architecture
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of Trade House's six key features including on-chain execution, partial fills, off-chain matching bots, live order tracking, competitive fees, and future integration with other liquidity sources like Spectrum LP boxes and SigmaUSD Bank Box.

topics.title: Trade House User Interface and Wallet Integration
topics.summary: Walkthrough of the Trade House interface including wallet connectivity (Nautilus, Ergo Pay), trading pair support, order placement methods, and order management features. Demonstration of active order monitoring and cancellation functionality.

topics.title: Order History and Execution Price Examples
topics.summary: Explanation of order history tracking and detailed execution information. Real examples showing how users can achieve better execution prices than their original orders, with sell orders executing at higher prices and buy orders at lower prices than requested.
